## Source: amazon-inspector (e37cade9ed9f558086d52e3d4d53a6892f73d271c38ea94d5c0dd25d2a2eee32)

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (09a05d2a84ef02b428f1176efd59cabf7a0b1c55bf4b0d8a2ac97c681ada2d2b)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'mbed-js' @ 5.0.9 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
